characters.name: Jin-U Seong
alt_names: The Weakest Hunter of All Mankind
characters.description:
__Class:__ Mage
__Relative(s):__ [Park Kyung-Hye](https://anilist.co/character/209396/KyungHye-Park) (Mother), [Sung Jin-Ah](https://anilist.co/character/138791/JinAh-Sung) (Sister), ~![Sung Il-Hwan](https://anilist.co/character/138790/IlHwan-Sung) (Father), [Cha Hae-In](https://anilist.co/character/138789/HaeIn-Cha) (Wife), [Sung Su-Ho](https://anilist.co/character/306654/Suho-Sung) (Son), [Yoo Jin-Ho](https://anilist.co/character/136076/JinHo-Yoo) (Brother in Law)!~ 
~!__Guild:__ Ahjin Guild (Guild Master)
__Affiliation:__ Korean Hunters Association (helper), White Tiger Guild (helper), Hunters Guild (helper), Knights Guild (helper), Ahjin Guild (Guild Master)!~

Seong Jin-U is the protagonist of [Solo Leveling](https://anilist.co/manga/105398/Solo-Leveling/) and is known as an infamously weak E-Rank Hunter. He is a humble and benevolent individual who cares deeply for his family and has an ardent desire to become stronger. As a result, he shares a close relationship with his sister and his mother, and rarely wastes an opportunity to refine his skills and gain more power.

~!He becomes an S-Rank hunter after being given a chance to become stronger by the System.!~

characters.name: Hae-In Cha
characters.description:
__Guild:__ Hunters Guild
__Class:__ Sword Fighter
__Affiliations:__ Jeju Island Raid Party, [Song Chi-Yul](https://anilist.co/character/136073/ChiYul--Song)’s Dojo (Disciple)

Cha Hae-In is the Vice-Guild Master of the Hunters Guild. She is an S rank hunter and the 9th ranked hunter in South Korea. She possesses the unique ability of mana smell and hates the smell of hunters except for [Sung Jin-Woo](https://anilist.co/character/129928/JinWoo-Sung).

characters.name: Chi-Yul Song
characters.description:
__Magic Type:__ Fire

Korean C-Rank Hunter and kumdo teacher. He is also one of Jinwoo's old friends, having known him since he was a E-Rank Hunter.

characters.name: Ju-Hui Lee
characters.description: She is a healer with rank B.

characters.name: Dong-Su Hwang
characters.description: Hwang Dong-su is an​ S-class hunter who works for Scavenger's Guild in America.

characters.name: Jin-Ho Yu
characters.description:
__Class:__ Tanker
__Guild:__ ~!Ahjin Guild (Vice-Guild Master)!~

Yoo Jin-Ho is a D rank hunter and is [Jin-U Seong](https://anilist.co/character/129928/JinWoo-Sung)'s faithful assistant and combat partner.

characters.name: Yun-Ho Baek
characters.description: He is a S rank hunter and master of the White Tiger guild.

characters.name: Jin-Cheol U
characters.description: An A rank hunter that works for Hunter's association of Korea.

characters.name: Il-Hwan Seong
characters.description: Il-Hwan is a muscular middle-aged man with black eyes, shaggy black hair, and slight facial hair. When using his powers or agitated, his eyes glows bright yellow.

characters.name: Jin-A Seong
characters.description: Younger sister of [Jin-U](https://anilist.co/character/129928).

characters.name: Geon-Hui Go
characters.description: Go Gun-Hee (고건희) is a South Korean S-Rank Hunter and the Chairman of the Korean Hunters Association.

characters.name: Song-I Han
characters.description: Han Song-I is an E-Rank hunter who quit school after gaining money through the Yoo Jin-Ho and Sung Jin-Woo motley group of party. She is friends with Sung Jin-Ah. She first appeared when Jin-Ah visited Jin-Woo in the hospital but she didn't know him then.

characters.name: Jong-In Choi
characters.description: Choi Jong-In is one of the 10 S-Rank Hunters of South Korea. He is also the Guild Master of the Hunters Guild.

characters.name: Igris
characters.description:
Igris is one of the first Shadows that Sung Jin-Woo acquired. He was initially protecting an empty throne in an Instant Dungeon where Jin-Woo was doing his Job Quest in the Job Change Quest Dungeon.

After two failed attempts of Shadow Extraction, Sung Jin-Woo convinced him to protect him instead of protecting an Empty throne, obtaining him as a Knight Grade Shadow.

characters.name: Byeong-Gyu Min
characters.description: Min Byung-Gyu was a retired hunter and one of the 10 S-Rank and only S-Rank Healer of South Korea. He was a close friend with the White Tiger's Guild Master Baek Yoon-Ho. He took part in the 4th Jeju Island Reclamation Raid and was a member of the Korean Raid Team tasked with killing the boss of the Jeju Island Gate.

characters.name: Beru
characters.description:
Born from the Ant Queen on Jeju Island, The Ant King becomes the main threat during the Fourth Jeju Island Raid.

~!Single-handedly responsible for the deaths of over 8 of the 16 S-Rank Hunters during the raid.!~ 

~!After being killed by Sung Jinwoo, the Ant King was revived as one of his shadow soldiers, and was given him the new name of Beru.!~

characters.name: Esil Radiru
characters.description: Esil Radiru, or Elisa Radiru, is a daughter of the Radiru chief and an Aristocratic Demon found at the S-Rank Demon's Castle Instant Dungeon.

characters.name: Atsushi Kumamoto
characters.description: Atsushi Kumamoto is one of Japan's strongest S-Rank Hunters. He is a member of Japan's most powerful guild, the Draw Sword Guild led by Goto Ryuji.

characters.name: Goto Ryuji
characters.description: Goto Ryuji is Japan's strongest S-Ranked Hunter and the Guild Master of Draw Sword Guild, one of the most powerful guilds in Asia.

characters.name: Tae-Shik Kang
characters.description: B-rank Hunter and An inspector working for South Korea's Hunter Association, Monitoring Division.

characters.name: Myung-Han Yu
characters.description: Yu Myung-Han (유명한) is Jin-Ho's father and the CEO of Yoojin Construction.

characters.name: Min-Sung Lee
characters.description: Famous Korean actor, known as Asia's biggest movie star. He is also an A-Rank Hunter.

characters.name: Hee-Jin Park
characters.description: Park Hee-Jin (박희진) is a member of White Tiger Guild that Sung Jin-Woo helped when they got stuck inside the Red Gate.

characters.name: Thomas Andre
characters.description: Thomas Andre (트마스 아드레) is one of only 5 National Level Hunters that exist and is considered to be the strongest Tank on Earth. He is also the Guild Master of the Scavenger Guild.

characters.name: Ki-Hoon Son
characters.description: Son Ki-Hoon (손기훈) is the Team Leader of Attack Force B of the Hunters Guild.

characters.name: Minoru Hoshino
characters.description: Minoru Hoshino (호시노 미노루) is one of Japan's strongest S-Rank Hunters. He is a member of Japan's strongest guild, the Draw Sword Guild led by Goto Ryuji.

characters.name: Tank
characters.description: Shadow of an ice bear that Jinwoo encountered during the Red Gate Incident.

characters.name: Kaisel
characters.description:
Kaisel is a shadow Sung Jin-Woo obtained in the Demon Castle. Kaisel is the shadow of Kaisellin, a Drake/Wyvern that Demon King Baran used as a mount.

Kaisel used to be a mount that the Demon King Baran rode in battle. After Sung Jin-Woo's fight, he looks around and found that Iron already killed Kaisellin, dragging his corpse towards Sung Jin-Woo. After he was extracted, his grade was Knight, which concludes he was at least an A-Rank.

characters.name: Kei
characters.description:
Kei (케이) was one of Japan's strongest S-Rank Hunters who was a member of the Draw Sword Guild, the strongest guild in japan led by Goto Ryuji.

He was a powerful mage class hunter specializing in ice magic.

characters.name: Reiji Sugimoto
characters.description:
Reiji Sugimoto is the Vice-Master of Draw Sword Guild, the second most powerful guild in Asia.

During the 4th Jeju Island Reclamation Raid, Reiji Sugimoto did not directly participate in the raid like his guild master Goto Ryuji. However, he was onboard the second DDH-184, one of the numerous Japanese boats surrounding the island.

characters.name: Mari Ishida
characters.description:
Mari Ishida was one of Japans strongest S-Rank Hunters.

~!She was effortlessly killed during the 4th Jeju Island Reclamation Raid.!~

characters.name: Ippei Izawa
characters.description: One of Japan's strongest S-Rank Hunters. He took part in the 4th Jeju Island Reclamation Raid.

characters.name: Zhigang Liu
characters.description: Zhigang Liu is one of the top five National Level Hunters in the world. Zhigang, who originated from China, was hired by the United States Government to aid with the first S-Rank Gate that appeared in the US.

characters.name: Dong-Wook Ma
characters.description: Ma Dong-Wook (마동욱) is one of the 10 S-Rank hunters of South Korea and the guild master of Fame Guild.

characters.name: Baruka
characters.description: S-Rank Ice Elf and the boss of the Red Gate Dungeon.

characters.name: Iron
characters.description: A shadow Sung Jin-Woo gained after entering the Red Gate. ~!Before being reawakened as a Shadow he was Chul Kim (김철), an A-Rank Hunter of the White Tiger Guild.!~

characters.name: Tusk
characters.description:
A shadow Sung Jin-Woo gained after entering the Hunters Guild Gate.

~!Tusk is a shadow of Kargalgan, originally a High Orc Shaman defeated by Jinwoo Sung during the Hunters Guild Gate Arc. After being resurrected, Tusk becomes one of Jinwoo's most potent magic users, known for his devastating area-of-effect spells and high intelligence. Even as a Shadow, Tusk kept his powerful abilities and spells, making him just as capable and even stronger than when he was alive.!~

characters.name: Ashborn
characters.description: Ashborn is the former Shadow Monarch. He was extremely powerful, being the Greatest Fragment of Brilliant Light. In other words, the Strongest Ruler and equalling the power of the Monarch of Destruction.

characters.name: Hokanui Gunju
characters.description:
The Ice Monarch is an extremely powerful Mage type being, holding powers that are related to the cold, such as ice and snow.

 ~!He was the second Monarch that met Jin-Woo, the first being Legia, the King of Giants. The Ice Monarch was also responsible for killing the Korean Hunters Association president, Go Gun-Hee.!~

characters.name: Yogumunt
characters.description: Yogumunt is one of the Monarchs who invaded earth, an archenemy of the Rulers.

characters.name: Christopher Reed
characters.description: Christopher Reed is an S-Rank hunter from USA. Reed is one of the few National Level Hunters.

characters.name: Yasu Songgonniui Gunju
alt_names: Greatest Hunter in the Chaos World

characters.name: Norma Selner
characters.description: Norma Selner is a hidden member of Federal Bureau of Hunters. She is an awakened human that possesses the ability to increase the strength of other awakened.

characters.name: Adam White
characters.description: Adam White is an agent of Federal Bureau of Hunters. A polyglot who served as Jin-Woo's translator while Beru is unavailable. He is said to be able to speak 10 languages. He is one of the most prominent foreign association-related figures along with David Brennon, director of the Federal Bureau of Hunters.

characters.name: Querehsha
alt_names: 역병의 군주 벌레들의 왕 (Yeokbyeongui Gunju Beolledeurui Wang)
characters.description: Querehsha is one of the Monarchs who invaded Earth, an archenemy of the Rulers.

characters.name: Kamish
characters.description: Kamish was an immensely powerful Magic Beast that appeared after a Dungeon Break occurred within the first S-Ranked Gate that opened within the USA and was responsible for destroying a portion of the western part of the USA and killing hundreds of Elite Hunters. Kamish is regarded as Humanity's worst calamity.

characters.name: Legia
characters.description: Legia is the Monarch of the Beginning.

characters.name: Kyung-Hye Park
characters.description:
Park Kyung-He is the mother of Jin-U and Jin-Ah. She was in the hospital because of the Eternal Sleep.

Her sickness served as the primary motivation for Jin-U becoming a hunter alongside his desire to support his sister with the absence of their father.

characters.name: Hanekawa
characters.description: Hanekawa is a member and official translator of Japan's most powerful Guild, Draw Sword. Despite serving primarily as a translator of Japan's best hunter, Goto Ryuji, she is also an A-Rank Hunter.

characters.name: Akari Shimizu
characters.description: Japanese S-Rank healer and a member of the Draw Sword Guild.
